name: Bodysnatchers In Bellwood
description:
A summer camp goes horribly wrong as pre-adolescent assailants take over Bellwood Camp in this short turn-based RPG.

Play against a friend as Player 1 acts as the lone survivor making their way down the Delwaki mountains and to safety, while Player 2 controls the bodysnatchers in hot pursuit. Use items, find secrets and traverse this game inspired by classic horror and sci-fi novels.

No moves are a guaranteed success though some have better chances of success than others. I would recommend that Player 1 be very careful with their moves and to avoid being caught in battle, and that Player 2 attempt to do the opposite by pursuing Player 1 at any cost.

Also I was gonna put a puzzle here for someone to figure out, but instead you can just have the prize. Try typing XYZZY at certain part. If Player 1 is struggling it might just be the boost they'll need.

SFX are all from ObsydianX and their Horror SFX Volume 1 which is under CC BY 4.0.

SCP-x6x (Hopes) by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/6736-scp-x6x-hopes-
